testCase.name: sqScannerExecutable: should read SONARQUBE_SCANNER_PARAMS provided by environment if it exists
sqScannerParams: should not set default values if sonar-project.properties file exists
sqScannerParams: should propagate custom server and token
sqScannerParams: should allow to override default settings and add new ones
sqScannerParams: should get mandatory information from basic package.json file
sqScannerParams: should get all information from package.json file
sqScannerParams: should take into account SONARQUBE_SCANNER_PARAMS env variable
sqScannerParams: should make priority to user options over SONARQUBE_SCANNER_PARAMS env variable
sqScannerParams: should get nyc lcov file path from package.json file
sqScannerParams: should get jest lcov file path from package.json file
